Html:
One of the controls that I have always felt that Microsoft should provide is that little old message box that tells you something useful and gives you the option to never see it again. I can't tell you how many times it would be a handy control to have!

I understand one of the difficulties with this control is determining if the user has elected to never see the message again, but if a required property on the constructer were the path to a registry key to hold this value it would work well enough.
